amendment.description: Amendment sought to zero out the amount made available for the new NATO headquarters in Brussels and apply the savings of $38.513 million to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: To reduce real property for agencies by $38,513,000, and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 151 - 269 (Roll no. 188).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 151 - 269 (Roll no. 188).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
